chickenGPT: Every night at 10 PM, the frog would hop by to remind the chick to take its medicine. 😴💊 One night, the frog hopped by and saw the chick fast asleep. 🙄 The frog tried to wake the chick, but it was no use. ⏰❌ The next morning, the chick woke up feeling groggy and sick. 🤕 The frog hopped by and said, "I told you to take your medicine last night!" 🐸 The chick replied, "I know, but I forgot. 🤷‍♀️" The frog sighed and said, "Well, now you know better than to forget. 🐸👍"
